Hannah and the Pirate Caves Reborn

Alpha 0.1.0

Changes from Alpha 0.0.1:

  • Converted from object-based collision and rending to tile-based rendering and grid-based collisions
  • Added support for CaveMaker level format (although there's currently no way to load user levels)
  • Added the particle that appears when you break a gem
  • You can no longer crouch in midair (you have to be crouching when you jump to remain crouching in midair)

Your browser doesn't support HTML5 canvas.
